page.title: 18Sizewell Beach
page.content: Sizewell is a peaceful little row of houses by the sea. One house sells fish. There are thirty five fishing boats and two full-time fishermen. The fisher men pull their boat up on the shore. The fishermen catch cod, dogfish, sprats, shrimp ,crabs, whiting, lobsters, soLe and plaice. Sizewell beach is mostly stones but there are banks of sand on the beach.Y ou can find star fish, different sorts of sea weed, crabs, mermaids purses,sea urchins, dead birds and fish.Thirty kinds of wild flowers have been found there. Sizewell has a cafe. It sells ice-creams, buckets and spades. There is a car park nearby with paths leading down to the beach. There are some beach huts under a cliff and some pill boxes. There is a coastguard station and an inn called the Vulcan Arms.
